content:
Hi, Harmonic is looking for part-time Lean experts again.

  • Job description at LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/4062320267/
  • Same at ashbyhq: https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/Harmonic/88bbddc5-555c-4023-86e3-6751ab3a265d
  • We expect minimum time commitment of 7 hr / week, no maximum
  • More information is available after you sign an NDA.
[I think there's a theoretical maximum of 168 hr / week]

Kevin Buzzard said:

[I think there's a theoretical maximum of 168 hr / week]

If someone has a time turner, they're welcome to use it...

We're hiring again! We offer a very competitive hourly rate, flexible hours, interesting tasks, and a support chat. As before, the job description is here. You can also contact @Kirsten Henningsgard with any questions about this job.
